text: Cornelia Maria "Corry" Brokken (3 December 1932 - 2 June 2016) was a Dutch singer, TV presenter and lawyer. She is known for her songs "Snip en Snap", "Voorgoed voorbij" and "Heel de wereld". After her singing career she studied law at Utrecht University in the 1970s. Afterwards she was a lawyer and later on a judge. Brokken died on 2 June 2016 in Laren, Netherlands at the age of 83.Corrie Brokken (83) overleden - AD == Eurovision Song Contest == Brokken was involved in the Eurovision Song Contest on four occassions. * Brokken was a contestant in the first ever Eurovision Song Contest, representing Netherlands. She did not win. * She returned as the Dutch entry in the Eurovision Song Contest 1957 with her song "Net als toen". This time, she won * She also participated in Eurovision 1958 but did not win. * In 1976, she was the presenter for the Eurovision Song Contest 1976. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Dutch judges Category:Dutch singers Category:Dutch television presenters Category:Eurovision Song Contest presenters Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners
title: Corry Brokken
